oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Receipt for direct taxes
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Receipt from the United States to Jno. W. Curd for payment of $15.75 for "collection of direct taxes in insurrectionary districts." The taxes, approved by Congress on February 6, 1863, were to pay for the war. Curd was a farmer in Wilson County, Tennessee.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Metro Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
